column3: Rebased, fixed travis, and made the commit hash start with `aaaa` to represent the pain I endured when writing the test.
Is this what we really want? If the tx is already in node 0's mempool, wouldn't this always return right away?
Oh, I think my comment is unclear. It refers to node[1]'s mempool.\n\nSo node[1] will rebroadcast the tx from the wallet even though it is already in node[1]'s mempool
ah! that makes a lot more sense.
how did you create this address? just curios :smile:
